gameServer.games.war

Class War

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameServer.games.war.War
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GameState

    public class War
extends java.lang.Object
implements GameState
    War handles the game logic for the card game and responds to commands given to it by the server
    Author:
    Jacob Richards

      • advanceTurn

        public void advanceTurn()
        Progresses the game, ends the current players turn and moves on to the next player. If both players have gone, CompareCards() is called.
